mapper.select: SELECT empinfo.empinfo_name, notice.* FROM empinfo INNER JOIN notice ON empinfo.empinfo_no = notice.empinfo_no_writer WHERE notice.notice_type = 'NOTICE'

SELECT notice.notice_no, empinfo.empinfo_name, notice.notice_title, notice.notice_content, notice.notice_createdat FROM notice INNER JOIN empinfo ON notice.empinfo_no_writer = empinfo.empinfo_no where notice_no = #{notice_no}
